scheduled_posts.current_events: Coinbase (COIN) Soars: Doubled Annual Revenue & Stellar Q4 Performance!
scheduled_posts.content: **Coinbase (COIN) â€“ Crypto Titan in 2025!** Q4 2024 delivered $2.3B in revenue (+88% QoQ) with transaction revenue soaring 172% to $1.6B, and annual revenue doubling to $6.6B. Q1 2025 update: ~$750M in transacts & a subscription forecast of $685-765M. #crypto
